playn.core

Class AssetWatcher.Listener

  • java.lang.Object
    • playn.core.AssetWatcher.Listener
  • Enclosing class:
    AssetWatcher

    public abstract static class AssetWatcher.Listener
extends Object
    A listener that is notified of asset loading progress and failures.

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      Listener() 

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods Concrete Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      abstract void done()
      Called when all assets are done loading (or had an error).
      abstract void error(Throwable e)
      Called for each asset that failed to load.
      void progress(int loaded, int errors, int total)
      Informs the listener of progress as each asset load completes or fails.

      • Methods inherited from class java.lang.Object

        equals, getClass, hashCode, notify, notifyAll, toString, wait, wait, wait

    • Constructor Detail

      • Listener

        public Listener()

    • Method Detail

      • progress

        public void progress(int loaded,
                     int errors,
                     int total)
        Informs the listener of progress as each asset load completes or fails.

      • done

        public abstract void done()
        Called when all assets are done loading (or had an error). This will be called after the final call to progress(int, int, int).

      • error

        public abstract void error(Throwable e)
        Called for each asset that failed to load.
